function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The risk of COVID-19 transmission in areas with high occupancy levels","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Consideration of additional factors besides occupancy, such as vulnerability and transmission risk","Technologies":"Occupancy models, danger models","People":"All individuals in high-occupancy areas","Owner":"City planners, public health officials"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of different population groups to COVID-19","Impact":"Higher impact of COVID-19 on vulnerable population groups","Mitigation":"Specific measures for protecting vulnerable populations, targeted public health interventions","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, targeted outreach programs","People":"Vulnerable population groups (e.g., elderly, individuals with pre-existing conditions)","Owner":"Public health agencies, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Transmission risk based on age and health status","Impact":"Variation in the severity of COVID-19 symptoms and illness based on age and health status","Mitigation":"Tailored public health messaging and interventions for different age groups and health statuses","Technologies":"Health data analysis, public health communication tools","People":"Public of all age groups and health statuses","Owner":"Public health agencies, healthcare providers"}]}
